subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. has always had players who were as memorable off the field as they were on because they had style, a flair for drama and, more often than not, an attention-getting proclamation.
snippet: The N.F.L. has always had players who were as memorable off the field as they were on because they had style, a flair for drama and, more often than not, an attention-getting proclamation.
